name_abbreviation: Northern Tier Solid Waste Authority v. Commonwealth

parties: NORTHERN TIER SOLID WASTE AUTHORITY, d/b/a Bradford County Landfill, McKean County Solid Waste Authority, Clinton County Solid Waste Authority, d/b/a Wayne Township Landfill, Appellants v. opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED. The Application to List Case for Oral Argument is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
